traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The thopter has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The thopter has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thopter's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
